Title: Requires persons the ages of 16 or 17 to wear a helmet when riding a class one or class two bicycle with electric assist
Summary: Requires persons the ages of 16 or 17 to wear a helmet when riding a class one or class two bicycle with electric assist.
LawCode: Amd ยง1238, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring certain persons to wear a helmet when operating a class one or class two bicycle with electric assist
